elements.text:
You are at a quiet restaurant with a lot of your family members for dinner. While taking a drink of your water, you accidently drop the glass on the floor and it shatters.

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I want to never come back to the restaurant, but if my family wants to eat here again it will be okay.
I offer to pick up overtime hours at my job and come back another day with money to replace the glass.
I cry because I feel terrible.
I want to cry, but decide that would not be helpful.
I offer to leave extra money for the tip.
